tool.title: field
tool.about:
Example of a Rappture <field> object.
Fields are a set of values defined on a mesh of some sort (see <mesh> element for details).
When you click the Simulate button, the inputs will be used to generate output fields.

about.label: Formula
about.description: Formula used to calculate the value of the field.

about.label: 3D Rendering
about.description: Determines the mesh type and method used for 3D rendering

about.label: Isosurface (Uniform Grid)
about.description: Renders a series of isosurfaces using a uniform 3D grid mesh.

about.label: Isosurface (Unstructured Grid)
about.description: Renders a series of isosurfaces using an unstructured 3D grid mesh with a hole.

about.label: Volume (OpenDX)
about.description: Renders a 3D volume using the deprecated OpenDX mesh/field format.
